title: Multiplayer 2D Top Down Shooter Template
description: 2D Top Down Shooter is the two-dimensional action-arcade experience template to make shooter development for PC and Android games much easier. Entirely made in Blueprint, setup and ready on the go for gameplay and instant action.
longDescription:
Version 3 Preview


Playable Sample




The 2D Top Down Shooter is the two-dimensional action-arcade experience template to make shooter development for Android and PC games much easier. Entirely made in Blueprint, setup and ready on the go for gameplay and instant action.


VERSION 3 FEATURES:

  • Multiplayer Game Modes: Control Point
  • Grenades
  • Improvements to UI, AI, and Network
  • Sniper Zoom Overhaul


* As an added bonus we also have a built-in main menu front-end widget template complete with a pause menu, load game slots menu, and a multiplayer server browser, as well as a credits and unlockables menu for any extra perks you want to slide into your game.



\==\ CONTACT INFO /==/

Official Website: www.neotlempire.com

Discord Server: Join Here!

Néotl Empire - Establish, Explore, Expand.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Multiplayer Game Modes: Control Point
  • Grenades
  • Improvements to UI, AI, and Network
  • Sniper Zoom Overhaul
  • Extended Multiplayer Support
  • Complete Network Replication
  • Multiplayer Game Modes: Deathmatch [FFA/Team], Capture The Flag
  • Save Game System
  • Offline Bot Support
  • Entire Game Framework
  • Fully-Functional Characters (AI, Bots, & Player)
  • Game-Ready AI
  • Behavior Tree
  • Tasks and Service specially designed for combat
  • Simple Team Allegiance System
  • Simple Weapon System
  • Weapon Wheel
  • Simple UI framework
  • Maze-like sprites for procedural generation
  • Health, Armor, Weapon, and Ammo pickups
  • Custom-built Sound Class System and Game Instance to work with the main menu
  • Main Menu Template w/ Basic Multiplayer Support
  • Server Browser



Total Number of Blueprints: 243

Number of Script Blueprints: 211

Number of Tutorial Blueprints: 31

Number of Widget Blueprints: 69

Number of AI Assets: 8

Number of Materials: 21

Number of Sprites: 105

Number of Flipbooks: 23

Number of Fonts: 2

Number of Levels: 4


Input: Keyboard, Mouse, Touch

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mobile

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mobile

Documentation: Yes [In-Editor]

releaseInfo.releaseNote:
- Fixed audio replication bug. Weapon sounds now replicate properly online.
- Fixed errors regarding player names from the PlayerState class.

- Upgraded to Unreal Engine 5.
- Fixed NUMEROUS bugs from transition.
- Removed tutorial blueprints since the parent class no longer exists.
